summary: More revealing variants of the male Imperial Armor. For MysticBinary\'s Nude Male HD and a less revealing version for the stock Bethesda meshes.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Update August 2013:[/color] I am in the process of porting this to Schlongs of Skyrim.

[b][u]Revealing Imperial Armor[/u][/b]

Textures and meshes for a more revealing variant of the Imperial Armor.

Versions for MysticBinary\'s and Sundracon\'s Male Body Mods are available,
plus a less revealing variant without any further dependencies and for a
little less nudity.


[u]Requirements[/u]

[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=265]BodyHair Nude Male HD[/url] by MysticBinary
or
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts New Vegas Male[/url] by Sundracon

[i]You need the \'Base Textures\' set and [b]only one[/b] of the Mesh Sets - depending on which Male Body Mod you are using.
Or use the \'Closed Skirt Mesh Set\' for a less revealing look which requires no other mods, but will still work fine with
them or any other body texture replacer.


[u]Installation[/u]
 
 - Download and extract the \'Base Textures\' set to the Data/ directory

 - Download and extract one of the mesh sets to the Data/ directory


[u]Uninstallation[/u]

 - Delete the files from the Data/ directory


[u]Credits[/u]

[i]Sundracon Set[/i]:
AlienSlof - Meshes
Sundracon - Conversion

[i]MysticBinary Set[/i]:
MysticBinary82 - Meshes

Bethesda - Textures
aoki - Fixes
author: Lugburzum
